Typed SQL queries for spring-jdbc maven plugin
Last Published: 25 Mar 2013  | Version: 1.2.1
Overview
  • Introduction
  • Goals
  • Github project

typed-queries:codegen

Full name:

com.alexkasko.springjdbc.typedqueries:typed-queries-maven-plugin:1.2.1:codegen

Description:

Maven-plugin, takes file with SQL queries and generates java methods for executing each query. For queries, that take input parameters, also generates an interface containing typed parameters getters.

Attributes:

  • Requires a Maven project to be executed.
  • Binds by default to the lifecycle phase: generate-sources.

Required Parameters

Name Type Since Description
queriesFile File - Queries file
User property is: typedqueries.queriesFile.

Optional Parameters

Name Type Since Description
checkSqlFileDate boolean - Whether to check SQL file date and skip code generation
Default value is: true.
User property is: typedqueries.checkSqlFileDate.
fullClassName String - Generated class name, uses query file name bt default
User property is: typedqueries.fullClassName.
isPublic boolean - Whether to make generated class and its methods public, package-private by default
User property is: typedqueries.isPublic.
queriesFileEncoding String - Queries file
Default value is: UTF-8.
User property is: typedqueries.queriesFile.
selectRegex String - Regular expression to use for identifying 'select' queries by name, default: '^select[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*$'
User property is: typedqueries.selectRegex.
templateFile File - FreeMarker template file for generating class
User property is: typedqueries.freemarkerTemplate.
templateFileEncoding String - FreeMarker template file encoding, 'UTF-8' by default
Default value is: UTF-8.
User property is: typedqueries.freemarkerTemplateEncoding.
templateRegex String - Regular expression to recognize query templates by name, default: '^[a-zA-Z0-9_$]*Template$'
User property is: typedqueries.templateRegex.
templateValueConstraintRegex String - Regular expression constraint for template substitution values, default: '^[a-zA-Z0-9_$]*$'
User property is: typedqueries.templateValueConstraintRegex.
typeIdMapJson String - Mapping of query parameter names postfixes to data types in JSON map format, e.g. '{"_long": "long", "_byte_a": "byte[]", "_date": "java.util.Date"}', see default in 'CodeGenerator' javadoc
User property is: typedqueries.typeIdMapJson.
updateRegex String - Regular expression to use for identifying 'insert', 'update' and 'delete' queries by name, default: '^(?:insert|update|delete|create|drop)[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*$'
User property is: typedqueries.updateRegex.
useBatchInserts boolean - Whether to generate additional insert (DML) methods (with parameters), those takes Iterator of parameters and execute inserts for the contents of the specified iterator in batch mode, false by default
User property is: typedqueries.useBatchInserts.
useCheckSingleRowUpdates boolean - Whether to generate additional update methods, those check that only single row was changed on update, false by default
User property is: typedqueries.useCheckSingleRowUpdates.
useIterableJdbcTemplate boolean - Whether to use iterable jdbc template extensions from this project (https://github.com/alexkasko/springjdbc-iterable), false by default
User property is: typedqueries.useIterableJdbcTemplate.
useTemplateStringSubstitution boolean - Whether to recognize query templates on method generation, false by default
User property is: typedqueries.useTemplateStringSubstitution.

Parameter Details

checkSqlFileDate:

Whether to check SQL file date and skip code generation
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: typedqueries.checkSqlFileDate
  • Default: true

fullClassName:

Generated class name, uses query file name bt default
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: typedqueries.fullClassName

isPublic:

Whether to make generated class and its methods public, package-private by default
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: typedqueries.isPublic

queriesFile:

Queries file
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: Yes
  • User Property: typedqueries.queriesFile

queriesFileEncoding:

Queries file
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: typedqueries.queriesFile
  • Default: UTF-8

selectRegex:

Regular expression to use for identifying 'select' queries by name, default: '^select[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*$'
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: typedqueries.selectRegex

templateFile:

FreeMarker template file for generating class
  • Type: java.io.File
  • Required: No
  • User Property: typedqueries.freemarkerTemplate

templateFileEncoding:

FreeMarker template file encoding, 'UTF-8' by default
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: typedqueries.freemarkerTemplateEncoding
  • Default: UTF-8

templateRegex:

Regular expression to recognize query templates by name, default: '^[a-zA-Z0-9_$]*Template$'
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: typedqueries.templateRegex

templateValueConstraintRegex:

Regular expression constraint for template substitution values, default: '^[a-zA-Z0-9_$]*$'
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: typedqueries.templateValueConstraintRegex

typeIdMapJson:

Mapping of query parameter names postfixes to data types in JSON map format, e.g. '{"_long": "long", "_byte_a": "byte[]", "_date": "java.util.Date"}', see default in 'CodeGenerator' javadoc
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: typedqueries.typeIdMapJson

updateRegex:

Regular expression to use for identifying 'insert', 'update' and 'delete' queries by name, default: '^(?:insert|update|delete|create|drop)[a-zA-Z][a-zA-Z0-9_$]*$'
  • Type: java.lang.String
  • Required: No
  • User Property: typedqueries.updateRegex

useBatchInserts:

Whether to generate additional insert (DML) methods (with parameters), those takes Iterator of parameters and execute inserts for the contents of the specified iterator in batch mode, false by default
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: typedqueries.useBatchInserts

useCheckSingleRowUpdates:

Whether to generate additional update methods, those check that only single row was changed on update, false by default
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: typedqueries.useCheckSingleRowUpdates

useIterableJdbcTemplate:

Whether to use iterable jdbc template extensions from this project (https://github.com/alexkasko/springjdbc-iterable), false by default
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: typedqueries.useIterableJdbcTemplate

useTemplateStringSubstitution:

Whether to recognize query templates on method generation, false by default
  • Type: boolean
  • Required: No
  • User Property: typedqueries.useTemplateStringSubstitution
